Sidang Kasus "Bupati Biadab" Dilanjut Jumat Pekan Ini
06 Nov 2019, 15:06 by Muhammad Sanusi


Sidang Kasus "Bupati Biadab" Dilanjut Jumat Pekan Ini

KBRN, Takengon : Sidang lanjutan perkara dugaan pencemaran nama baik Bupati Aceh Tengah Shabela Abubakar akan dilanjutkan pada Jumat (8/11/2019) mendatang di Pengadilan Negeri Takengon. Sidang ke enam kalinya itu beragendakan mendengar keterangan ahli bahasa dari balai bahasa di Banda Aceh.
Kajari Takengon melalui Jaksa Penuntut Umum (JPU) Juanda Fadli mengatakan, sidang ke enam kalinya ini dilanjutkan pasca penundaan pada Jumat (1/11/2019) lalu lantaran saksi bahasan dari Banda Aceh berhalangan hadir.
“Jumat ini Insya Allah sudah bisa hadir,” katanya kepada RRI, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Sidang lanjutan itu katanya, juga akan dihadiri oleh terdakwa SM. Juanda juga mengaku, Majelis Hakim Pengadilan Negeri Takengon tidak menahan tedakwa SM karena dianggap kooperatif. 
Sidang lanjutan dijadwal dipimpin ketua PN Takengon Endi Nurindra Putra, SH, MH didampingi Khairu Rizki, SH dan Muhamad Adi Hendrawan, SH sebagai hakim anggota. 
Diketahui pertengahan Juli 2019, Pemerintah Aceh Tengah melalui Kabag Hukum melaporkan SM ke polisi pasca postingannya diduga mencemarkan nama baik Bupati Aceh Tengah Shabela Abubakar.  SM menulis status bernuasa pencemaran nama baik di akun facebook miliknya. Ia menulis Bupati Aceh Tengah terbiadab dalam tender proyek. Dalam status itu ia diduga kesal akibat kalah tender.

The "Biadab Regent" Trial Case Continues Friday This Week
Nov 6, 2019, 15:06 by Muhammad Sanusi


The "Biadab Regent" Trial Case Continues Friday This Week

KBRN, Takengon: Continuing hearings on the alleged defamation of the Central Aceh Regent Shabela Abubakar will be resumed on Friday (11/08/2019) at the Takengon District Court. The sixth session was scheduled to hear the statements of linguists from the language hall in Banda Aceh.
Kajari Takengon through the Public Prosecutor (JPU) Juanda Fadli said, the sixth session was resumed after the postponement on Friday (1/11/2019) because the discussion witnesses from Banda Aceh were unable to attend.
"This Friday, God willing, can be present," he told RRI on Wednesday (11/06/2019).
The follow-up session he said, would also be attended by SM defendants. Juanda also claimed that the Takengon District Court Judges did not hold SM students because they were considered cooperative.
The follow-up session was scheduled to be led by PN Takengon chairman Endi Nurindra Putra, SH, MH accompanied by Khairu Rizki, SH and Muhamad Adi Hendrawan, SH as a member judge.
Known in mid-July 2019, the Central Aceh Government through the Head of Law reported that SM to the police after his post allegedly defamed the Central Aceh Regent Shabela Abubakar. SM wrote the status of defamation in his facebook account. He wrote that the Central Aceh Regent was civilized in the project tender. In that status he was allegedly upset because he lost the tender.
